description: Try our easy to follow Enchiladas With Rice & Beans recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Enchiladas With Rice & Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g no added salt diced Italian tomatoes
125 g super grains gluten free super duo rice
280 g free from gluten corn tortillas

recipeInstructions.text: Warm tortillas as per packet instructions. Lay one on a board and top with 1/3 cup bean mixture. Roll up to enclose filling and place into dish. Repeat. Pour over remaining tomatoes and sprinkle over cheeses. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until cheese melts and is golden. Top with sour cream and remaining coriander, and serve with lime wedges.

Pour over remaining tomatoes and sprinkle over cheeses. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until cheese melts and is golden. Top with sour cream and remaining coriander, and serve with lime wedges.
